name: Destruction
description: Those who follow the "Destruction" Path admire recklessness, anger, and destructive behavior.

name: Hunt
description: Those who follow the "Hunt" Path admire determination, ruthlessness, and tenacious behavior.

name: Erudition
description: Those who follow the "Erudition" Path admire thinking, logic, and strategic behavior.

name: Harmony
description: Those who follow the "Harmony" Path admire understanding, support, and cooperative behavior.

name: Nihility
description: Those who follow the "Nihility" Path admire laziness, exhaustion, and meaningless behavior.

name: Preservation
description: Those who follow the "Preservation" Path admire patience, sacrifice, and defensive behavior.

name: Abundance
description: Those who follow the "Abundance" Path admire selflessness, altruism, and healing behavior.
